description: You are in a wide rocky pit. An aisle leads upwards to the north.

errors.south: The slope is too steep here.
errors.east: The slope is too steep here.

hint: here's my special hint for you.

dir_descriptions.up: You spread your wings and start to fly.

description: You are in the dark room. The walls are pitch black.
shortdescription: You are in the dark room.

description: You are standing in the middle of a wide open field. In the west the silhouette of an enormeous castle cuts the sky. A slippery aisle leads downwards to the south.
shortdescription: You are in a wide open field.

description: You are in a secret room! Magic skribblings decorate the walls. There is a door leading west.
shortdescription: You are in the secret room.

description: You are in the most secret room.
You are at the marketplace in the middle of a small village.
